events.name: GDG Cloud HK on Board - How to learn Google Cloud
events.description:
*** 此活動主要以廣東話／粵語進行 ***
*** All sessions are in CANTONESE (zh-yue-Hant-HK)***

###Please register in Eventbrite###
Register Link: https://www.eventbrite.com/e/gdg-cloud-hk-on-board-how-to-learn-google-cloud-tickets-68419772381

想開始學習Google Cloud，但不知道從哪裡開始？ 加入我們的活動。 Danny Wong 會介紹學習Google Cloud的最佳方式。

內容級別：初學者

語言：粵語with English slides

時間表:

19:00 介紹GDG Cloud Hong Kong

19:10 如何學習Google Cloud

20:00 集體照

20:10 分享和交流（免費飲料和食物）

Speaker: Danny Wong is a Customer Engineer for Google Cloud, assisting Hong Kong customers to transform and digitize their business with emerging technology of cloud, data, application and things in the digital era. He has 16 years of experience in enterprise networking, data center, security and collaboration technologies.

門票有限，先到先得。

#GDGCloudHK #GDGCloud #GDGHK

主辦｜Organizers:
GDG Cloud Hong Kong

場地贊助｜Venue Support:
Google Hong Kong

events.name: GDG Cloud HK English talk 1: graphql CRUD + GCP  + Hasura + Cloud SQL
events.description:
*** This sessions are in English ***

###Please register in Eventbrite###
Register Link: https://www.eventbrite.com/e/gdg-cloud-hk-english-talk-1-graphql-crud-gcp-hasura-cloud-sql-tickets-71662188535
no walk-in due to security requirement of event venue ***

Language：English

Time:

18:20 Door opening and regisation

18:30 Welcome and introduction GDG Cloud Hong Kong

18:40 how to deploy a scalable graphql CRUD service on GCP using Hasura and Cloud SQL

19:30 Group Photo

19:40 End

ABOUT THE SPEAKER:
Joseph Cooper ( Google Developer Expert ) began his journey in software development 20 years ago at the age of 9. It all started in modding games, which led to accidentally generating meaningful revenue and now globally scaling products & teams internationally. Altogether made Joseph a hands-on technical leader and entrepreneur.
Born and bred in Silicon Valley, Joseph now spends his time between San Francisco and Hong Kong leading companies and teams to build amazing products that most people dare not to face. Everything from real-money gaming in India tasting 600M USD in transactions per year to developer tools that transform software teams to safely release ideas/products/apps/websites faster. Joseph enjoys extremely challenging tech problems that require brilliant, fun and passionate teams of people to unite towards a single vision.
As of late, Joseph's becoming an expert in Go, Kubernetes, Docker, and GraphQL but previously mastered Unity3D, .net/core, and Java. Including low-level distributed computing & high concurrency TCP/UDP programming to high-level multi-region data architecture design.

#GDGCloudHK #GDGCloud #GDGHK

Organizers:
GDG Cloud Hong Kong

Venue Support:
Google Hong Kong
